title: bitbollo
author: bitbollo
created_time: September 05, 2023, 06:36:40 AMLast edit: December 05, 2024, 11:19:38 AM by bitbollo
content: I am selling a Wallet Keep Key - NEW with plastic intact (never opened/original seal) - BEST ON LINE PRICE!44 euro INCLUDING SHIPPING WORLDWIDE WITH TRACK CODE - Poste Italiane Raccomandata!(note- if you want other service like private courier just ask... price will be adapted)KEEP KEYhttps://www.keepkey.com/This wallet allows you to store Bitcoin, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Namecoin, Testnet, Ethereum (also ERC-20 tokens) and Dashcoin... This is currently the lowest price you will find on internet for this item!BTC Payment accepted here 1BoSH7RisUAPpGfNbX8scSB43YP6Tx3g7M or bc1qm9wnwsgy52jdefvm5g4w72lxqep5d9ks4gq62pLN? Just ask I will create an invoice. Other crypto? Just ask... (LTC ETH ZCASH etc)

comments.author: BABY SHOES
comments.body: Including free shipping to Indonesia?I'll think about it

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: After the last firmware update it froze my KeepKey, nothing but a paper weight now.Lots of people reporting the same problem Good to buy as a collectable, but maybe not so good to use as cold storage

comments.author: BABY SHOES
comments.body: Quote from: CoinageMint on September 06, 2023, 01:57:14 PMAfter the last firmware update it froze my KeepKey, nothing but a paper weight now.Lots of people reporting the same problem Is that true? This is the first time I've heard of KeepKey, but looking for a KeepKey thread in the forum about firmware update issues, it's not there.Quote from: CoinageMint on September 06, 2023, 01:57:14 PMGood to buy as a collectable, but maybe not so good to use as cold storage I plan to keep the asset, the price is far from the price on the official site.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: BABY SHOES on September 06, 2023, 01:48:11 PMIncluding free shipping to Indonesia?I'll think about itYes sure, that's not the cheapest place where to ship items from Italy, but yes, free shipping with track code included (Poste Italiane) also to Indonesia.Quote from: CoinageMint on September 06, 2023, 01:57:14 PMAfter the last firmware update it froze my KeepKey, nothing but a paper weight now.Lots of people reporting the same problem Good to buy as a collectable, but maybe not so good to use as cold storage I don't know about specific issues  . Despite I have taken some during the years, I am not fan of hardware wallet. Here I am selling as collectible (sealed/wrapped).

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: I remember when they did their cyber monday sales on these bad boy for 15 bucks a piece, I ended up getting like 7 or 8 lmao. Does anyone actually use this wallet?

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: tread93 on October 07, 2023, 07:38:52 PMI remember when they did their cyber monday sales on these bad boy for 15 bucks a piece, I ended up getting like 7 or 8 lmao. Does anyone actually use this wallet? no I didn't get on this occasion but thanks for share  I was completely not aware  personally no. I have some hardware wallets (also from other brands/model) but I am just taking as "collectibles-sealed" and not for "real usage"edit= if you take in account international shipment fees the price is "similar" to this "cyber monday sales"
